title: General Provisions
content:

§ 5.7 - Waiver of physical fitness standards

§ 5.12 - Licenses and other official identification
§ 5.13 - Security officer's and supervisory security officer's uniform
§ 5.14 - Information to be furnished by employers
§ 5.15 - Records to be maintained by security officers and supervisory security officers

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
